articles.title: Do Afrikaners want to leave South Africa for the US? - BBC
articles.description: Claims of a white genocide are widely discredited, so how do Afrikaners feel about Trump's claims – and offer of refugee status?
articles.content:
Khanyisile Ngcobo
Ulrich Janse van Vuuren has made it his passion to share and showcase some of South Africa's best features with his legion of social media followers.
The 38-year-old white South A… [+9422 chars]
